skills.name: Supply Chain Management
skills.description: Proficiency at starting manufacturing jobs remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which manufacturing jobs can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

skills.name: Advanced Mass Production
skills.description: Further training in the operation of multiple factories. Ability to run 1 additional manufacturing job per skill level.

skills.name: Drug Manufacturing
skills.description: Needed to manufacture boosters.

skills.name: Research
skills.description: Skill at researching more efficient production methods. 5% bonus to blueprint manufacturing time research per skill level.

skills.name: Laboratory Operation
skills.description: Allows basic operation of research facilities. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.

skills.name: Sleeper Encryption Methods
skills.description: Understanding of the techniques and methods to reverse engineer Sleeper technology.

skills.name: Metallurgy
skills.description: Advanced knowledge of mineral composition. 5% Bonus to material efficiency research speed per skill level.

skills.name: High Energy Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of High Energy Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of various energy system modules as well as smartbombs and laser based weaponry. 

Allows High Energy Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring High Energy Physics per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Plasma Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Plasma physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of particle blaster weaponry as well as plasma based missiles and smartbombs. 

Allows Plasma Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Plasma Physics per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Nanite Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Nanite Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of various armor and hull systems. 

Allows Nanite Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nanite Engineering per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Hydromagnetic Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Hydromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology . 

Used primarily in the research of shield system.

Allows Hydromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Hydromagnetic Physics per level.

skills.name: Amarr Starship Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Amarr Starship Engineering. 

Used in the research of Amarr Ships of all Sizes.

Allows Amarr Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Amarr Starship Engineering per level.

skills.name: Minmatar Starship Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Minmatar Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used in the research of Minmatar Ships of all Sizes.

Allows Minmatar Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Minmatar Starship Engineering per level.

skills.name: Graviton Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Graviton physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of Cloaking and other spatial distortion devices as well as Graviton based missiles and smartbombs. 

Allows Graviton Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Graviton Physics per level.

skills.name: Laser Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Laser Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. 

Used primarily in the research of Laser weaponry as well as EM based missiles and smartbombs.

Allows Laser Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Laser Physics per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Electromagnetic Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Electromagnetic Physics and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of Railgun weaponry and various electronic systems.  

Allows Electromagnetic Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electromagnetic Physics per level.

skills.name: Rocket Science
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Rocket Science and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of missiles and propulsion systems.  

Allows Rocket Science research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Rocket Science per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Gallente Starship Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Gallente Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used in the research of Gallente Ships of all Sizes.

Allows Gallente Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Gallente Starship Engineering per level.

skills.name: Nuclear Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Nuclear physics and its use in the development of advanced technology.  

Used primarily in the research of Projectile weaponry as well as Nuclear missiles and smartbombs. 

Allows Nuclear Physics research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Nuclear Physics per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Mechanical Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Mechanical Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used in all Starship research as well as hull and armor repair systems.  

Allows Mechanical Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Mechanical Engineering per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Electronic Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Electronic Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used in all Electronics and Drone research.  

Allows Electronic Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Electronic Engineering per level.

skills.name: Caldari Starship Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Caldari Starship Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used in the research of Caldari Ships of all Sizes.

Allows Caldari Starship Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Caldari Starship Engineering per level.

skills.name: Quantum Physics
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Quantum Physics and its use in the development of advanced Technology. 

Used primarily in the research of shield systems and Particle Blasters.  

Allows Quantum Physics research to be performed through a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Quantum Physics per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Astronautic Engineering
skills.description: Skill and knowledge of Astronautics and its use in the development of advanced technology. This skill has no practical application for capsuleers, and proficiency in its use conveys little more than bragging rights.

skills.name: Molecular Engineering
skills.description:
Skill and knowledge of Molecular Engineering and its use in the development of advanced technology. 

Used primarily in the research of various hull and propulsion systems.  

Allows Molecular Engineering research to be performed with the help of a research agent. 1% reduction in manufacturing time for all items requiring Molecular Engineering per level.

Needed for all research and manufacturing operations on related blueprints.

skills.name: Research Project Management
skills.description: Skill at overseeing agent research and development projects. Allows the simultaneous use of 1 additional Research and Development agent per skill level.

skills.name: Talocan Technology
skills.description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Talocan technology.

The Talocan were masters of Spatial manipulation and Hypereuclidean Mathematics.

Allows the rudimentary use of Talocan components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

skills.name: Sleeper Technology
skills.description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Sleeper technology.

The Sleepers were masters of virtual reality, neural interfacing and cryotechnology.

Allows the rudimentary use of Sleeper components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

skills.name: Caldari Encryption Methods
skills.description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Caldari State and its allies.

skills.name: Minmatar Encryption Methods
skills.description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Minmatar Republic and its allies.

skills.name: Amarr Encryption Methods
skills.description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Amarr Empire and its allies.

skills.name: Gallente Encryption Methods
skills.description: Understanding of the data encryption methods used by the Gallente Federation and its allies.

skills.name: Takmahl Technology
skills.description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Takmahl technology.

The Takmahl nation excelled in cybernetics and bio-engineering.

Allows the rudimentary use of Takmahl components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

skills.name: Yan Jung Technology
skills.description:
Basic understanding of interfacing with Yan Jung technology.

The Yan Jung nation possessed advanced gravitronic technology and force field theories.

Allows the rudimentary use of Yan Jung components in the creation of advanced technology, even though the scientific theories behind them remain a mystery.

skills.name: Scientific Networking
skills.description: Skill at running research operations remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which research projects can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

skills.name: Advanced Laboratory Operation
skills.description: Further training in the operation of multiple laboratories. Ability to run 1 additional research job per skill level.

skills.name: Defensive Subsystem Technology
skills.description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced defensive subsystems.

skills.name: Core Subsystem Technology
skills.description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced core subsystems.

skills.name: Offensive Subsystem Technology
skills.description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced offensive subsystems.

skills.name: Propulsion Subsystem Technology
skills.description: Understanding of the technology used to create advanced propulsion subsystems.

skills.name: Electronic Warfare
skills.description:
Operation of ECM jamming systems. 5% less capacitor need for ECM and ECM Burst systems per skill level.

Note: Does not affect capital class modules.

skills.name: Sensor Linking
skills.description: Skill at using remote sensor booster/dampener. 5% less capacitor need for sensor link per skill level.

skills.name: Weapon Disruption
skills.description: Skill at using remote weapon disruptors. 5% less capacitor need for weapon disruptors per skill level.

skills.name: Propulsion Jamming
skills.description: Skill at using propulsion/warpdrive jammers. 5% Reduction to Warp Scrambler, Warp Disruptor, and Stasis Web capacitor need per skill level.

skills.name: Target Breaker Amplification
skills.description:
Improves the continuous reflection of active target spectrum breakers, resulting in much improved defenses against all those who wish to target any vessel in the vicinity.

Reduces duration time and capacitor need of Target Spectrum Breakers by 5% per level.

skills.name: Cloaking
skills.description: Skill at using Cloaking devices. 10% reduction in targeting delay after uncloaking per skill level.

skills.name: Long Distance Jamming
skills.description: Skill at the long-range operation of electronic warfare systems. 10% bonus to optimal range of ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Weapon Disruptors, Remote Tracking Computers, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.

skills.name: Frequency Modulation
skills.description: Advanced understanding of signal waves. 10% bonus to falloff for ECM, Remote Sensor Dampeners, Weapon Disruptors, Remote Tracking Computers, Remote Sensor Boosters and Target Painters per skill level.

skills.name: Signal Dispersion
skills.description: Skill at the operation of target jamming equipment. 5% bonus to strength of all ECM jammers per skill level.

skills.name: Signal Suppression
skills.description: Skill at the operation of remote sensor dampers. 5% bonus to remote sensor dampers' scan resolution and targeting range suppression per skill level.

skills.name: Weapon Destabilization
skills.description: Advanced understanding of weapon disruption technology. 5% bonus to the effectiveness of Weapon Disruptor modules per skill level.

skills.name: Target Painting
skills.description: Skill at using target painters. 5% less capacitor need for target painters per skill level.

skills.name: Signature Focusing
skills.description: Advanced understanding of target painting technology. 5% bonus to target painter modules' signature radius multiplier per skill level.

skills.name: Tactical Logistics Reconfiguration
skills.description: Skill at the operation of triage modules. 25-unit reduction in strontium clathrate consumption amount for module activation per skill level.

skills.name: Burst Projector Operation
skills.description: Operation of Burst Projector systems. Each skill level gives a 5% reduction in module activation time.

skills.name: Drones
skills.description: Skill at remote controlling drones. Can operate 1 drone per skill level.

skills.name: Drone Avionics
skills.description:
Skill at control range for all drones.

Bonus: Drone control range increased by 5000 meters per skill level.

skills.name: Mining Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling mining drones. 5% bonus to mining drone yield per skill level.

skills.name: Repair Drone Operation
skills.description: Allows operation of logistic drones. 5% increased repair amount per level.

skills.name: Salvage Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling salvage drones. 2% increased salvage chance per level.

skills.name: Heavy Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling heavy combat drones. 5% bonus to heavy drone damage per level.

skills.name: Drone Interfacing
skills.description:
Improves damage and mining yield for drones and fighters under your control.

10% bonus to drone damage and drone mining yield per level.
10% bonus to fighter damage per level.

skills.name: Drone Navigation
skills.description:
Skill at controlling drones at high speeds.

5% increase in drone max velocity per level.
5% increase in fighter max velocity per level.

skills.name: Amarr Drone Specialization
skills.description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Amarr drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Amarr Drone Specialization.

skills.name: Minmatar Drone Specialization
skills.description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Minmatar drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Minmatar Drone Specialization.

skills.name: Gallente Drone Specialization
skills.description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Gallente drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Gallente Drone Specialization.

skills.name: Caldari Drone Specialization
skills.description: Specialization in the operation of advanced Caldari drones. 2% bonus per skill level to the damage of light, medium, heavy and sentry drones requiring Caldari Drone Specialization.

skills.name: Mining Drone Specialization
skills.description: Advanced proficiency at controlling mining drones. 2% bonus to the mining yield and max velocity of drones requiring Mining Drone Specialization per level.

skills.name: Fighters
skills.description: Allows operation of fighter craft. 5% increase in fighter damage per level.

skills.name: Advanced Drone Avionics
skills.description:
This skill is required for the operation of Electronic Warfare Drones but also gives a bonus to the control range of all drones.

3,000m bonus drone control range per level.

skills.name: Sentry Drone Interfacing
skills.description: Skill at controlling sentry drones. 5% bonus to Sentry Drone damage per level.

skills.name: Drone Sharpshooting
skills.description:
Increases the weapon range of drones and fighters.

5% bonus to drone optimal range per level.
5% bonus to fighter optimal range per level.

skills.name: Drone Durability
skills.description:
Increases drone and fighter hit points.

5% bonus to drone shield, armor and hull hit points per level.
5% bonus to fighter hit points per level.

skills.name: Light Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling light combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of light drones per level.

skills.name: Fighter Hangar Management
skills.description: 5% bonus to Fighter Hangar size per level.

skills.name: Heavy Fighters
skills.description: Allows operation of heavy fighter craft. 5% increase in heavy fighter damage per level.

skills.name: Medium Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling medium combat drones. 5% bonus to damage of medium drones per level.

skills.name: Light Fighters
skills.description: Allows operation of light fighter craft. 5% increase in light fighter velocity per level.

skills.name: Support Fighters
skills.description: Allows operation of support fighter craft. 5% increase in support fighter hit-points per level.

skills.name: Ice Harvesting Drone Operation
skills.description: Skill at controlling ice harvesting drones. 5% reduction in ice harvesting drone cycle time per level.

skills.name: Ice Harvesting Drone Specialization
skills.description: Advanced proficiency at controlling ice harvesting drones. 2% reduction in cycle time and bonus to max velocity of drones requiring Ice Harvesting Drone Specialization per level.

skills.name: Trade
skills.description: Knowledge of the market and skill at manipulating it. Active buy/sell order limit increased by 4 per level of skill.

skills.name: Retail
skills.description: Ability to organize and manage market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 8.

skills.name: Broker Relations
skills.description: Proficiency at driving down market-related costs. Each level of skill subtracts a flat 0.1% from the costs associated with setting up a market order in a non-player station, which usually come to 3% of the order's total value. This can be further influenced by the player's standing towards the owner of the station where the order is entered.

skills.name: Visibility
skills.description:
Skill at acquiring products remotely. Each level of skill increases the range your remote buy orders are effective to from their origin station. Level 1 allows for the placing of remote buy orders with a range limited to the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for a full regional range.

Note: Only remotely placed buy orders (using Procurement) require this skill to alter the range. Any range can be set on a local buy order with no skill.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.description:
Proficiency at placing remote buy orders on the market. Level 1 allows for the placement of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for placement of remote buy orders anywhere within current region.  

Note: Placing buy orders and directly buying an item are not the same thing. Direct remote purchase requires no skill.

skills.name: Daytrading
skills.description: Allows for remote modification of buy and sell orders. Each level of skill increases the range at which orders may be modified. Level 1 allows for modification of orders within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for market order modification anywhere within current region.

skills.name: Wholesale
skills.description: Ability to organize and manage large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 16.

skills.name: Margin Trading
skills.description: Ability to make potentially risky investments work in your favor. Each level of skill reduces the percentage of ISK placed in market escrow when entering buy orders. Starting with an escrow percentage of 100% at Level 0 (untrained skill), each skill level cumulatively reduces the percentage by 25%. This will bring your total escrow down to approximately 24% at level 5.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.description: Skill at selling items remotely. Each level increases the range from the seller to the item being sold. Level 1 allows for the sale of items within the same solar system, Level 2 extends that range to systems within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level then doubles it. Level 5 allows for sale of items located anywhere within current region.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.description: Proficiency at squaring away the odds and ends of business transactions, keeping the check books tight. Each level of skill reduces sales tax by 10%.

skills.name: Tycoon
skills.description: Ability to organize and manage ultra large-scale market operations. Each level raises the limit of active orders by 32.

skills.name: Corporation Contracting
skills.description:
You are familiar with the intricacies of formalizing contracts between your corporation and other entities. 

For each level of this skill the number of concurrent corporation/alliance contracts you make on behalf of your corporation is increased by 10 up to a maximum of 60. 

This skill has no effect on contracts you make personally.

There is no limit on the number of contracts a corporation can assign to itself.

Corporations have a hard limit of 500 outstanding public contracts.

skills.name: Contracting
skills.description:
This skill allows you to create formal agreements with other characters. 

For each level of this skill the number of outstanding contracts is increased by four (up to a maximum of 21 at level 5)

skills.name: Customs Code Expertise
skills.description:
Expertise in cutting through the red tape of customs regulations. Reduces Import and Export empire tax in Customs Offices by 10% per level.

This does not affect InterBus Customs Offices.

skills.name: Navigation
skills.description: Skill at regulating the power output of ship thrusters. 5% bonus to sub-warp ship velocity per skill level.

skills.name: Afterburner
skills.description: Skill at using afterburners. 5% reduction to Afterburner duration and 10% reduction in Afterburner capacitor use per skill level.

skills.name: Fuel Conservation
skills.description: Skill at improved control over afterburner energy consumption. 10% reduction in afterburner capacitor needs per skill level.

skills.name: Acceleration Control
skills.description: Skill at efficiently using Afterburners and MicroWarpdrives. 5% Bonus to Afterburner and MicroWarpdrive speed boost per skill level.

skills.name: Evasive Maneuvering
skills.description: Improved skill at efficiently turning and accelerating a spaceship. 5% improved ship agility for all ships per skill level.

skills.name: High Speed Maneuvering
skills.description: Skill at using Microwarpdrives. 5% reduction in Microwarpdrive capacitor usage per skill level.

skills.name: Warp Drive Operation
skills.description: Skill at managing warp drive efficiency. 10% reduction in capacitor need of initiating warp per skill level.

skills.name: Jump Drive Operation
skills.description: Skill at using Jump Drives. 5% reduction in capacitor need of initiating a jump per skill level.

skills.name: Micro Jump Drive Operation
skills.description: Skill at using Micro Jump Drives. 5% reduction in activation time per skill level.

skills.name: Cynosural Field Theory
skills.description: Skill at creating effective cynosural fields. 10% reduction in liquid ozone consumption for module activation per skill level.

skills.name: Jump Fuel Conservation
skills.description: Skill at regulating energy flow to the jump drive. 10% reduction in isotope consumption amount for jump drive operation per light year per skill level.

skills.name: Jump Drive Calibration
skills.description: Advanced skill at using Jump Drives. 20% increase in maximum jump range per skill level.

skills.name: Jump Portal Generation
skills.description: Skill for the generation of jump portals to distant solar systems. 10% reduced material cost for jump portal activation per level.

skills.name: Social
skills.description: Skill at social interaction. 5% bonus per level to NPC agent, corporation and faction standing increase.

skills.name: Negotiation
skills.description: Skill at agent negotiation. 5% additional pay per skill level for agent missions.

skills.name: Diplomacy
skills.description: Skill at interacting with hostile Agents in order to de-escalate tense situations as demonstrated by some of the finest diplomats in New Eden. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards hostile Agents. Not cumulative with Connections or Criminal Connections.

skills.name: Fast Talk
skills.description: Skill at interacting with Concord. 5% Bonus to effective security rating increase.

skills.name: Connections
skills.description: Skill at interacting with friendly NPCs. 4% Modifier to effective standing from friendly NPC Corporations and Factions per level. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Criminal Connections.

skills.name: Criminal Connections
skills.description: Skill at interacting with friendly criminal NPCs. 4% Modifier per level to effective standing towards NPCs with low Concord standing. Not cumulative with Diplomacy or Connections.

skills.name: Mining Connections
skills.description:
Understanding of corporate culture on the industrial level and the plight of the worker.

Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Mining corporation division.

skills.name: Distribution Connections
skills.description:
Understanding of the way trade is conducted at the corporate level.

Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Distribution corporation division.

skills.name: Security Connections
skills.description:
Understanding of military culture.

Improves loyalty point gain by 10% per level when working for agents in the Security corporation division.

skills.name: Shield Operation
skills.description: Skill at operating a spaceship's shield systems, including the use of shield boosters and other basic shield modules. 5% reduction in shield recharge time per skill level.

skills.name: Shield Management
skills.description: Skill at regulating a spaceship's shield systems. 5% bonus to shield capacity per skill level.

skills.name: Tactical Shield Manipulation
skills.description: Skill at preventing damage from penetrating the shield, including the use of shield hardeners and other advanced shield modules. Reduces the chance of damage penetrating the shield when it falls below 25% by 5% per skill level, with 0% chance at level 5.

skills.name: Shield Emission Systems
skills.description: Operation of shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for shield emission system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Shield Upgrades
skills.description: Skill at installing shield upgrades e.g. shield extenders and shield rechargers. 5% reduction in shield upgrade powergrid needs.

skills.name: Thermal Shield Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

skills.name: EM Shield Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

skills.name: Kinetic Shield Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

skills.name: Explosive Shield Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Shield Amplifiers.

skills.name: Shield Compensation
skills.description:
Improved skill for regulating energy flow to shields. 2% less capacitor need for shield boosters per skill level.

Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.

skills.name: Capital Shield Operation
skills.description: Operation of capital shield boosters and other shield modules. 2% reduction in capacitor need for capital shield boosters per skill level.

skills.name: Capital Shield Emission Systems
skills.description: Operation of capital sized shield transfer array and other shield emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital shield emission system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Invulnerability Core Operation
skills.description: Skill at operating the Rorqual's Pulse Activated Nexus Invulnerability Core module. 10% increase per level to the effect duration and cycle time of the Pulse Activated Nexus Invulnerability Core.

skills.name: Mechanics
skills.description: Skill at maintaining the mechanical components and structural integrity of a spaceship. 5% bonus to structure hit points per skill level.

skills.name: Repair Systems
skills.description:
Operation of armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in repair systems duration per skill level.

Note: Has no effect on capital sized modules.

skills.name: Hull Upgrades
skills.description: Skill at maintaining your ship's armor and installing hull upgrades like expanded cargoholds and inertial stabilizers. Grants a 5% bonus to armor hit points per skill level.

skills.name: Remote Armor Repair Systems
skills.description: Operation of remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote armor repair system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Capital Repair Systems
skills.description: Operation of capital armor/hull repair modules. 5% reduction in capital repair systems duration per skill level.

skills.name: EM Armor Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to EM resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

skills.name: Explosive Armor Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to explosive resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

skills.name: Kinetic Armor Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to kinetic resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

skills.name: Thermal Armor Compensation
skills.description: 5% bonus to thermal resistance per level for Armor Coatings and Energized Platings.

skills.name: Capital Remote Armor Repair Systems
skills.description: Operation of capital sized remote armor repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital remote armor repair system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Remote Hull Repair Systems
skills.description: Operation of remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for remote hull repair system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Capital Remote Hull Repair Systems
skills.description: Operation of capital class remote hull repair systems. 5% reduced capacitor need for capital class remote hull repair system modules per skill level.

skills.name: Armor Layering
skills.description: Skill at installing upgraded armor plates efficiently and securely, reducing the impact they have on agility and speed. Grants a 5% reduction to armor plate mass penalty per level.

skills.name: Long Range Targeting
skills.description: Skill at long range targeting. 5% Bonus to targeting range per skill level.

skills.name: Target Management
skills.description: Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.

skills.name: Advanced Target Management
skills.description: Skill at targeting multiple targets. +1 extra target per skill level, up to the ship's maximum allowed number of targets locked.

skills.name: Signature Analysis
skills.description: Skill at operating Targeting systems. 5% improved targeting speed per skill level.

skills.name: Magnetometric Sensor Compensation
skills.description:
Skill at hardening Magnetometric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Magnetometric Sensor Strength per skill level.

Magnetometric Sensors are primarily found on Gallente, Serpentis, ORE, and Sisters of EVE ships.

skills.name: Gravimetric Sensor Compensation
skills.description:
Skill at hardening Gravimetric Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Gravimetric Sensor Strength per skill level.

Gravimetric Sensors are primarily found on Caldari, Guristas and Mordu's Legion ships.

skills.name: Ladar Sensor Compensation
skills.description:
Skill at hardening Ladar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Ladar Sensor Strength per skill level.

Ladar Sensors are primarily found on Minmatar and Angel ships.

skills.name: Radar Sensor Compensation
skills.description:
Skill at hardening Radar Sensors against hostile Electronic Counter Measure modules. 4% improved Radar Sensor Strength per skill level.

Radar Sensors are primarily found on Amarr, Blood Raider and Sanshas ships.

skills.name: Weapon Upgrades
skills.description: Knowledge of gunnery computer systems, including the use of weapon upgrade modules. 5% reduction per skill level in the CPU needs of weapon turrets, launchers and smartbombs.

skills.name: Power Grid Management
skills.description: Basic understanding of spaceship energy grid systems. 5% Bonus to ship's powergrid output per skill level.

skills.name: Capacitor Systems Operation
skills.description: Skill at operating your ship's capacitor, including the use of capacitor boosters and other basic energy modules. 5% reduction in capacitor recharge time per skill level.

skills.name: Capacitor Management
skills.description: Skill at regulating your ship's overall energy capacity. 5% bonus to capacitor capacity per skill level.

skills.name: Energy Pulse Weapons
skills.description: Skill at using smartbombs. 5% decrease in smartbomb duration per skill level.

skills.name: Capacitor Emission Systems
skills.description: Operation of energy transfer array and other energy emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of energy emission weapons per skill level.

skills.name: Energy Grid Upgrades
skills.description: Skill at installing power upgrades e.g. capacitor battery and power diagnostic units. 5% reduction in CPU needs of modules requiring Energy Grid Upgrades per skill level.

skills.name: CPU Management
skills.description: Basic understanding of spaceship sensory and computer systems. 5% Bonus to ship CPU output per skill level.

skills.name: Electronics Upgrades
skills.description: Skill at installing electronic upgrades, such as signal amplifiers, co-processors and backup sensor arrays. 5% reduction of CPU needs for all modules requiring Electronics Upgrades per skill level.

skills.name: Advanced Weapon Upgrades
skills.description: Reduces the powergrid needs of weapon turrets and launchers by 2% per skill level.

skills.name: Capital Capacitor Emission Systems
skills.description: Operation of capital remote capacitor transmitters and other capacitor emission systems. 5% reduced capacitor need of capital capacitor emission systems per skill level.

skills.name: Thermodynamics
skills.description: Advanced understanding of the laws of thermodynamics. Allows you to deliberately overheat a ship's modules in order to push them beyond their intended limit. Also gives you the ability to frown in annoyance whenever you hear someone mention a perpetual motion unit. Reduces heat damage by 5% per level.

skills.name: Nanite Operation
skills.description: Skill at operating nanites. 5% reduction in nanite consumption per level.

skills.name: Nanite Interfacing
skills.description: Improved control of general-purpose repair nanites, usually deployed in a paste form. 20% increase in damaged module repair amount per second.

skills.name: Resistance Phasing
skills.description:
Improves control over, and flow between, nano membranes that react to damage by shifting resistances.

Reduces cycle time of Reactive Armor Hardeners, Flex Armor Hardeners and Flex Shield Hardeners by 10% per level and capacitor need by 15% per level.

skills.name: Astrometrics
skills.description:
Skill at operating long range scanners.

+5% scan strength per level.

-5% max scan deviation per level.

-5% scan probe scan time per level.

skills.name: Survey
skills.description: Skill at operating ship, cargo and survey scanners. 5% improvement per level in the scan speeds of those module types.

skills.name: Archaeology
skills.description:
Proficiency at identifying and analyzing ancient artifacts. Required skill for the use of Relic Analyzer modules.

Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

skills.name: Hacking
skills.description:
Proficiency at breaking into guarded computer systems. Required skill for the use of Data Analyzer modules.

Gives +10 Virus Coherence per level.

skills.name: Astrometric Rangefinding
skills.description: Skill for the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% increase to scan probe strength per level.

skills.name: Astrometric Pinpointing
skills.description: Greater accuracy in hunting down targets found through scanning. Reduces maximum scan deviation by 5% per level.

skills.name: Astrometric Acquisition
skills.description: Skill at the advanced operation of long range scanners. 5% reduction in scan probe scan time per level.

skills.name: Reprocessing
skills.description:
Skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products.

3% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Mining
skills.description: Skill at using mining lasers. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.

skills.name: Reprocessing Efficiency
skills.description:
Advanced skill at using reprocessing facilities in station, outposts and starbases to break ores and ice down into refined products.

2% bonus to ore and ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Astrogeology
skills.description: Skill at analyzing the content of celestial objects with the intent of mining them. 5% bonus to mining turret yield per skill level.

skills.name: Deep Core Mining
skills.description: Skill at operating mining lasers requiring Deep Core Mining. 20% reduction per skill level in the chance of a damage cloud forming while mining Mercoxit.

skills.name: Arkonor Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in Arkonor reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Arkonor reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Bistot Processing
skills.description:

skills.description:

skills.name: Spodumain Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in Spodumain reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Spodumain reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Veldspar Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in Veldspar reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Veldspar reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Scrapmetal Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in Scrapmetal reprocessing. Increases reprocessing returns for modules, ships and other reprocessable equipment (but not ore and ice).

2% bonus to ship and module reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Ice Harvesting
skills.description: Skill at harvesting ice. 5% reduction per skill level to the cycle time of ice harvesters.

skills.name: Ice Processing
skills.description:
Skill for Ice reprocessing. Allows a skilled individual to utilize substandard reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Ice reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Mining Upgrades
skills.description: Skill at using mining upgrades. 5% reduction per skill level in CPU penalty of mining upgrade modules.

skills.name: Gas Cloud Harvesting
skills.description: Skill at harvesting gas clouds. Allows use of one gas cloud harvester per level.

skills.name: Salvaging
skills.description: Proficiency at salvaging ship wrecks. Required skill for the use of salvager modules. 100% increase in chance of salvage retrieval per additional level.

skills.name: Industrial Reconfiguration
skills.description: Skill at the operation of industrial core modules. 50-unit reduction in heavy water consumption amount for module activation per skill level.

skills.name: Reactions
skills.description: Allows basic operation of Reaction Service Module. 4% reduction in reaction time per skill level.

skills.name: Mass Reactions
skills.description: Allows the operation of multiple reactions simultaneously. Ability to run 1 additional reaction job per level.

skills.name: Advanced Mass Reactions
skills.description: Further training in the operation of multiple reactions. Ability to run 1 additional reaction job per skill level.

skills.name: Remote Reactions
skills.description: Proficiency at starting reaction jobs remotely. Without this skill, one can only start jobs within the solar system where one is located. Each level increases the distance at which reaction jobs can be started. Level 1 allows for jobs at a range within 5 jumps, and each subsequent level adds 5 more jumps to the range, with a maximum of a 25 jump range.

skills.name: Ubiquitous Moon Ore Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in reprocessing of the most common forms of ore extracted from New Eden's moons. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Zeolites, Sylvite, Bitumens, and Coesite reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Common Moon Ore Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in reprocessing of the moderately common forms of ore extracted from New Eden's moons. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Cobaltite, Euxenite, Titanite, and Scheelite reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Uncommon Moon Ore Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in reprocessing of the less common forms of ore extracted from New Eden's moons. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Otavite, Sperrylite, Vanadinite, and Chromite reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Rare Moon Ore Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in reprocessing of the rarer forms of ore extracted from New Eden's moons. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Carnotite, Zircon, Pollucite, and Cinnabar reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Exceptional Moon Ore Processing
skills.description:
Specialization in reprocessing of the rarest and most prized forms of ore extracted from New Eden's moons. Allows a skilled individual to utilize reprocessing facilities at considerably greater efficiency.

2% bonus to Xenotime, Monazite, Loparite, and Ytterbite reprocessing yield per skill level.

skills.name: Biology
skills.description: The science of life and of living organisms, and how chemicals affect them. 20% Bonus to attribute booster duration per skill level.

skills.name: Cybernetics
skills.description: The science of interfacing biological and machine components. Allows the use of cybernetic implants.

skills.name: Infomorph Psychology
skills.description:
Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. The reality of having one's consciousness detached from one's physical form, scattered across the galaxy and then placed in a vat-grown clone can be very unsettling to the untrained mind.

Allows 1 jump clone per level.

Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

skills.name: Cloning Facility Operation
skills.description:
Needed for use of the Clone Vat Bay module. 

Special: Increases a Clone Vat Bay's maximum clone capacity by 15% per skill level.

skills.name: Neurotoxin Recovery
skills.description: Proficiency at biofeedback techniques intended to negate the side effects typically experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

skills.name: Neurotoxin Control
skills.description: Proficiency at reducing the severity of the side effects experienced upon injection of combat boosters.

skills.name: Infomorph Synchronizing
skills.description:
Psychological training that strengthens the pilot's mental tenacity. Improved ability to synchronize with new clones allows pilots to jump-clone more frequently without risk of neural damage.

Reduced time between clone jumps by 1 hour per level.

Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

skills.name: Advanced Infomorph Psychology
skills.description:
Advanced training for those Capsuleers who want to push clone technology to its limits.

Allows 1 additional jump clone per level.

Note: Clones can only be installed in stations with medical facilities or in ships with clone vat bays. Installed clones are listed in the character sheet.

skills.name: Advanced Planetology
skills.description:
The advanced understanding of planet evolution allowing you to interpret data from scans of planets for resources at much higher resolutions.

Bonus: The skill further increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for very precise surveying.

skills.name: Planetology
skills.description:
The understanding of planet evolution allowing you to better interpret data from scans of planets for resources.

Bonus: The skill increases the resolution of resource data when scanning a planet to allow for more accurate surveying.

skills.name: Interplanetary Consolidation
skills.description: For each level in this skill, you may install a command center on one additional planet, to a maximum of 6 planets. You can have only one command center per planet.

skills.name: Command Center Upgrades
skills.description: Each level in this skill improves the quality of command facility available to you, in turn allowing for a greater number of connected facilities on that planet.

skills.name: Remote Sensing
skills.description:
The ability to gather and analyze remote sensing data from satellites in orbit around a planet and produce properly calibrated surveys.

Level 1: allows scans within 1 ly
Level 2: allows scans within 3 ly
Level 3: allows scans within 5 ly
Level 4: allows scans within 7 ly
Level 5: allows scans within 9 ly

skills.name: Starbase Defense Management
skills.description: Skill at using starbase weapon systems. Allows control of one array per level. Arrays must be placed outside of the forcefield to be controlled.

skills.name: Anchoring
skills.description: Skill at Anchoring Deployables.

skills.name: Structure Missile Systems
skills.description:
Basic operation of structure missile launchers.

2% bonus to all structure missile and guided bomb damage per level.

skills.name: Structure Doomsday Operation
skills.description:
Specialization in operating Citadel doomsday weapons.

2% reduction in Arcing Vorton Projector duration per level.

skills.name: Structure Electronic Systems
skills.description:
Basic operation of structure electronic modules.

3% reduction in capacitor consumption of all structure electronic warfare and tackle modules per level.

skills.name: Structure Engineering Systems
skills.description:
Basic operation of structure engineering modules.

2% reduction in capacitor consumption of all structure energy neutralizers and point defense batteries per level.
